title: Test 1
description: Let your AI help you find the best domain! Check availability and get costs in one shot and heck, even have your AI register your shiny new domain for you!

tools.description: Check if a domain name is available for registration

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort results by: NAME (default), EXPIREDATE, CREATEDATE

parameters.name: listType
parameters.description: Filter by domain status: ALL (default), EXPIRING, EXPIRED

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of domains per page (must be 10-100, default: 20)

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search for domains containing this term

tools.description: List all domains in your Namecheap account with optional filtering
